product_name: ClarinsHydra-Essentiel Silky Moisturizer with Double Hyaluronic Acid
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackClarins Hydra-Essentiel Silky Moisturizer with Double Hyaluronic Acid is a super-quenching, nourishing, silky face cream with exclusive Hyaluronic Power Complex plumps normal to dry skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsNourishes, comforts, softensHelps minimize damage from environmental aggressors and pollution that lead to premature signs of agingKey IngredientsHyaluronic Acid: of 100% natural origin; locks in moistureResearch ResultsPlumper skin in 60 seconds* + 24 hour hydration*****99% skin is softer*For 75% of women, skin is visibly plumped - Consumer test, Hydra-Essentiel Silky Cream, reported by 107 women after 60 seconds.**Clinical test, 30 women, after 24 hours.***Consumer test, Hydra-Essentiel Silky Cream, 107 women, immediately after application.Item 2606367How To UseCLARINS' EXCLUSIVE DRAINING PRESSURE APPLICATION METHODSmooth over clean face and neck each morning.Apply with gentle press-and-release movements, avoiding the eye contour area.Work downward, over neck and d√©collet√©.IngredientsAqua/Water/Eau, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Betaine, Propanediol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Glycerin, Pentylene Glycol, Silica, Glyceryl Stearate, Peg-100 Stearate, Stearyl Alcohol, Dimethicone, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, Cetearyl Glucoside, Squalane, Parfum/Fragrance, Hydroxyacetophenone, Sodium Hyaluronate, Chlorphenesin, Ethylhexylglycerin, Tocopheryl Acetate, Dimethiconol, Polysorbate 60, Tocopherol, Disodium Edta, Butylene Glycol, Sorbitan Isostearate, Kalanchoe Pinnata Leaf Extract, Marrubium Vulgare Extract, Citric Acid, Phenethyl Alcohol, Furcellaria Lumbricalis Extract, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate, Lapsana Communis Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Maris Sal/Sea Salt/Sel Marin. [V4181A].Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: CLARINS' EXCLUSIVE DRAINING PRESSURE APPLICATION METHODSmooth over clean face and neck each morning.Apply with gentle press-and-release movements, avoiding the eye contour area.Work downward, over neck and d√©collet√©.

reviews.headline: Perfect for my sensitive skin
reviews.comments: Clarins is the best products for my super sensitive skin!

reviews.headline: This is Awesome
reviews.comments: The smell is good, The lightness of the cream is amazing and it makes my skin feel like new, very refreshing!

reviews.headline: Amazing product!
reviews.comments: I have used another brand for over 30 years, which I really like but, they keep upping their prices and I can't justify using it any longer. I am 75 years young and  have always had sensitive skin issues. This product is wonderful!  Feels great on my skin, no stickiness and my makeup looks so fresh; this moisturizer does everything the other brand did for me but at a more affordable price. This is my new go to moisturizer!

reviews.headline: Its name says it all
reviews.comments: I got a sample of this cream and ordered it that very day. It is creamy and works well with or without makeup.

reviews.headline: The best night moisturizer I've tried
reviews.comments: My skin is sensitive to breakouts. Usually when I use a very hydrating cream, I get pimples all over. This is the only cream that consistently gives me amazing results. No breakouts ever and applies like butter - super luxurious feeling (been using for a year now). So many other popular brands clog my pores badly. My skin stays clear with this and will continue to purchase for a long time.

reviews.headline: was great... now not so much..
reviews.comments: i used this cream for months and it was perfect for my skin. Then they reformulate and now i can't use it al all. It gives me breakouts like I've never had before.  The same thing happened with the pink jar set.

reviews.headline: Stay away sensitive skin girlies
reviews.comments: My sensitive face started getting bumpy, red, and itchy after the first week of use. I threw it away.

reviews.headline: My favorite
reviews.comments: This is my favorite cream. I have dry skin that occasionally (monthly)breaks out. This makes my skin feel so nice and my foundation goes on like a dream! I love the light scent as well. 10 out of 10!

reviews.headline: Lighter weight
reviews.comments: Lighter than extra firming but felt sticky when used after toning. Heavy fragrance not good for sensitive skin flared my rosacea. Did make my dry skin soft but returning this one,

reviews.headline: Exceeded expectations
reviews.comments: I love the fragrance.  I did t find it overwhelming.  I also like how quickly absorbs into the skin and doesn't have yhat greasy feel after on the tace.  I typically layer this with serums.  I tried it in the colder dry months and makes my skin feel  hydrated.

reviews.headline: I would like to buy this product again.
reviews.comments:
I had been use this product over 20 years 
It worked very good on my skin.

reviews.headline: Actually gave me glass skin
reviews.comments: This is marketed for normal-dry skin but I have combo-oily and my skin drinks this! Also not marketed for my age range (20s), but if you're looking to splurge, this is it! I bought it on a whim as a Beauty Steal and I would absolutely buy it again. It's super hydrating but lightweight, not greasy, great for sensitive skin, and leaves me with a healthy glow! This moisturizer has helped to smooth my skin especially as I'm dealing with breakouts - gives me better glass skin than some Asian beauty products that claim to do so. Love love love!

reviews.headline: I would buy again
reviews.comments: A light moisturizer that delivers maximum hydration.  I have always had good results from Clarins products.

reviews.headline: Smells awful
reviews.comments: This could be a great prduct if they took out the nasty fragrance. It's so bad and lingers on my skin for hours. When I use this one, my cat won't come near me and cowers if I try to oet him. That should tell you how bad the smell of this is.

reviews.headline: Buy it.
reviews.comments: Buy it.

reviews.headline: Way too fragrant
reviews.comments: Never used any face product that is this much perfumed. Thinking about return.

reviews.headline: I am definitely buying it again
reviews.comments: I decided to give this cream a try & wow I love how smooth my skin looks and feels. Highly recommend.

reviews.headline: Different smell from the same face cream that I used before
reviews.comments: Different smell from cream that I bought from other places, but the texture seems like the same. I have used this same Clarins face cream for years, this one clearly has the different smell that I used to have. Instead of floral scent, this smells like chemical.

reviews.headline: Smells like your grannies handbag
reviews.comments: I was recommended this by an Ulta employee. I was told there was no fragrance in it and trusted her. Well shame on me because the smell of this moisturizer is exactly like little old grandma bath soaps... like the decorative ones you never use and for good reason. I thankfully applied to my hand not my face, but the smell lingers on the skin after six hand washes. Returning as soon as possible! The smell is so incredibly strong and seems to stain the skin. Yuck!

reviews.headline: Loved the feel of Clarins
reviews.comments:
First time user and will most definitely buy again
Smooth and my skin type absorbed this product immediately

faceoff_positive.comments: I got Double Serum Eye, Hand & Nail treatment cream, Hydra-Essentiel Moisturizer + Hyaluronic Acid, all works for my skin. I love it, I highly recommended products specially for women age 40-50 or even 60's.
faceoff_positive.headline: Amazing Skin Care Products

faceoff_negative.comments: It feels sticky and after an hour or so my skin felt drier than it did before. I've been using the old formula for many years, and I have to find a new moisturizer now. Super sad they changed it. If you are in a dry environment, hyaluronic acid will actually draw moisture out of your skin, making this pretty useless as a thick moisturizer for dry weather.
faceoff_negative.headline: Old formula was amazing, this is terrible.

rollup.name: Hydra-Essentiel Silky Moisturizer with Double Hyaluronic Acid
